The British School of Guangzhou
6th May 2014
Dear Year 1 to Year 9 CAL and CFL Parents,
The Chinese Department is currently preparing for an end of year Chinese exam for all CAL and CFL students from Year 1 to Year 9.
Chinese teachers will start preparing the students by reviewing all they have learnt in their Chinese lessons from the beginning of the year. It would be appreciated if you could encourage your child to review what they have studied throughout the year.
